steps.descr: Crush in the walnuts and add a pinch of black pepper.

on_enter.say: Right, let's get those walnuts crushed and add a lovely pinch of black pepper. It'll add a nice crunch and a bit of spice to our salad!

steps.instructions: Crush in the walnuts and add a pinch of black pepper.

steps.descr: Trim the pear and apple and finely slice into matchsticks.

on_enter.say: Now, let's trim the pear and apple and slice them into lovely matchsticks. They'll add a sweet and juicy crunch to our salad!

steps.instructions: Trim the pear and apple and finely slice into matchsticks, place in the base of the bowl and toss in the dressing.

steps.descr: Roughly chop the frisee, trim and finely slice the round red chicory and add to the bowl with the rocket.

on_enter.say: Let's give the frisee a rough chop and slice up that beautiful red chicory. Add them to the bowl with a handful of peppery rocket. It's going to be a feast for the eyes and the taste buds!

steps.instructions: Roughly chop the frisee, trim and finely slice the round red chicory and add to the bowl with the rocket.

steps.descr: Trim the long red and white chicory, cut in half, then separate into leaves, finely slice the stalk and add everything to the bowl.

on_enter.say: Let's trim the long chicory, separate those lovely leaves, and slice the stalk finely. Add it all to the bowl. It's going to add a nice bit of texture!

steps.instructions: Trim the long red and white chicory, cut in half, then separate into leaves, finely slice the stalk and add everything to the bowl.

steps.descr: Peel the clementines and finely slice horizontally into rounds.

on_enter.say: Now, peel those juicy clementines and slice them into lovely rounds. They'll add a burst of sweetness and colour to our salad!

steps.instructions: Peel the clementines and finely slice horizontally into rounds.

on_enter.say: Let's toss everything together now. Give it a good mix so all those fantastic flavours come together beautifully. Then, it's ready to serve and enjoy!
